category: Physical environment; Personnel, management and administration procedures; Operations and service delivery; Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
description: Conditions with which third-party services are delivered change substantially.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish lasting service level agreements with third-party provider with minimal scope for their subsequent renegotiation In the event of risk’s execution:
- Implement policy to seek alternative service providers capable of offering more favourable terms
name: Change of terms within third-party service contracts
notes: - Are third-party service or utilities contracts subject to renewal or due to be renegotiated?
preMitigationNotes:
- Electricity prices escalate
- Web hosting service provider withdraws a relied-upon technology from its servers
